9.title: David Tutera's More Top Ten
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Wanda Ortiz
1.plot: David gives Wanda the South Beach wedding she couldn't plan herself.

2.title: Jennifer Coppola
2.plot: David transforms Jennifer's wedding - and Jennifer herself.

3.title: Mandy
3.plot: David works with a bleach blonde, tattoo-covered New Jersey bride.

4.title: Seria Powell
4.plot: David discards Seria's turquoise, budget wedding.

5.title: Amanda Becvar
5.plot: David helps Amanda realize her dream of an Irish wedding.

6.title: Bayyina Joseph
6.plot: By David's standards, Bayyina's "majestic" wedding falls a bit short.

1.title: Caroline, "Bling Bride"
1.plot: David helps a crystal-loving bride to create a sparkling wedding.

2.title: Nicole, "Purple Bride"
2.plot: David wants a Jamaican bride's wedding to reflect her heritage.

3.title: Quiana, "Discount Store Bride"
3.plot: Bride wants a spring wedding with a winter wonderland theme.

4.title: Kricket, "Merlot Bride"
4.plot: Bride wants a pink merlot-themed wedding.

5.title: Dayira, "Candy Bride"
5.plot: Sweet-toothed bride wants a candy-themed wedding.

6.title: Lauren,
6.plot: David helps a couple realize their dream of a medieval-themed wedding.

7.title: Jamie, "Mummer Bride"
7.plot: Bride wants an outlandish, colorful, costumed wedding celebration.

8.title: Bernadette, "African Queen/Old School Krush Groove Bride"
8.plot: Bride wants to be an African Queen, so David creates a Safari Wedding!

9.title: Christina Velez,
9.plot: A Mexican destination wedding coincides with the swine flu outbreak.

10.title: Noelle Kane, "The Steel Magnolia Bride"
10.plot: Southern bride wants a big city wedding.

11.title: Corryn Conyer, "The 50s Hollywood Glamour Bride"
11.plot: Bride dreams of looking like Audrey Hepburn at a 1950's wedding.

12.title: Varneka Edwards, "The Golden Bride"
12.plot: Bride dreams of having a Big Apple wedding in Delaware.

1.title: Poker Bride
1.plot: Meet a bride that loves all things Vegas, and plans on wearing a light up dice garter. Can David convert her NJ ceremony into the best of Las Vegas?

2.title: Spring Bride
2.plot: David Tutera meets a bride that has lists for her lists and then more lists. All she wants is a springtime wedding. Can David make it happen?

3.title: Great Gatsby Bride
3.plot: David Tutera meets a bride who wants a 1920's inspired wedding, but doesn't have any reception space and she's three weeks away from the big day!

4.title: Zen Bride
4.plot: Planning a wedding usually involves some chaos, even for David Tutera. But he's about to meet Jessica and her Zen-themed wedding.

5.title: Diva Bride
5.plot: What is David to do with a bride whose dream wedding theme is "swamp?" With only three weeks until the wedding, he's either going to sink or swim.

6.title: Swamp Bride
6.plot: They say everything is bigger in Texas, and so is the personality of David's new Dallas bride.

7.title: Cowboy Bride
7.plot: With many brides, the dress is the most important thing for her wedding. But with David Tutera's next bride -- it's all about the cowboy boots.

8.title: Pirate Bride
8.plot: David meets a bride pleading for "Pirates of the Caribbean" themed nuptials. Missing the mark on this one might mean David will be walking the plank!

9.title: Purple Princess Bride
9.plot: Every bride dreams of having a fairytale wedding, especially David's latest bride. But what this bride sees as regal, he sees as a royal disaster!

10.title: Butterfly Bride
10.plot: David Tutera's latest bride explains that to envelop her guests in her favorite fly habitat, as found in nature, would be her dream come true.

11.title: Day of the Dead Bride
11.plot: This bride wants to celebrate death. Over David's dead body! He transforms this nuptial nightmare into a party that would make Tim Burton jealous.

12.title: Greek Goddess Bride
12.plot: David's next bride thinks her fiance is a Greek god. But her idea of statues and loose robes suggests David will have to tread with caution.

1.title: A Superstar Is Born
1.plot: With a bride who's a self-proclaimed supermodel, David Tutera has to find a way to turn her mis-matched wedding into the ultimate blinged-out affair.

2.title: Phantom of the Opera Bride
2.plot: This bride is hoping to recreate the glamour and drama of The Phantom of the Opera. David has just three weeks to put on a wedding worthy of Broadway.

3.title: Alice in Wonderland Bride
3.plot: With his new bride's heart set on an Alice in Wonderland wedding, David has to help turn her concept into an elegant take on the classic tale.

4.title: Wizard of Oz Bride
4.plot: David Tutera meets a bride whose Wizard of Oz wedding has him spinning in circles. Does she have the courage and heart to deal with his changes?

5.title: Passport to Africa Bride
5.plot: A My Fair Wedding first - a bride who fights David every step of the way. Can David change Shelby's "Africa" theme into a majestic and elegant wedding?

6.title: Breast Cancer Survivor Bride
6.plot: Kimberly's theme of 1950's Havana presents David with challenges, but her hope to include breast cancer awareness into the theme creates problems.

7.title: Mini Truck Bride
7.plot: Michelle and Josh's mini-truck theme has David working hard. Amazingly, he is able to incorporate the theme into an elegant, yet fun reception hall!

8.title: Winter Wonderland Bride
8.plot: David helps a bride who wants her wedding to be in a Winter Wonderland. Dealing with centerpieces straight from the Christmas aisle makes it difficult

9.title: Hearts Bride
9.plot: David meets Heather, a bride who wants to use her wedding to celebrate her love... of love! He helps her create a ceremony that captures their love.

10.title: Monopoly Bride
10.plot: David Tutera assists a bride who is trying to incorporate the game Monopoly into her wedding. David works to make the classic board game come to life.

11.title: Belly Dancer Bride
11.plot: Shirley wants a wedding that celebrates her love of belly dancing. With only three weeks to work, can David prevent this wedding from being a disaster?

12.title: Royal Bride
12.plot: David meets a bride who wants her wedding to be a royal event, complete with crowns and castles. He makes this bride's dream wedding become a reality

1.title: Make-A-Wish Bride
1.plot: Bride Wendy put off her wedding when her son got cancer. Now her son wants to bring in David Tutera and throw his mom the wedding of her dreams.

2.title: Fashionista Bride
2.plot: David newest bride is so clothes-crazy that she spent most of her budget on the dress and shoes. David has to transform these festivities in a hurry.

3.title: Goth Bride
3.plot: Bride Kristina wants a Goth wedding complete with spiders, skulls and even an all-black wedding dress! David wants to lighten up the festivities.

4.title: Tuscany Bride
4.plot: David meets a bride who wants a Tuscan-style wedding. Trouble is, her mom is taking over and everyone just lost their jobs.

5.title: Dragonfly Bride
5.plot: David has his work cut out for him, having to convince the bride that she deserves every part of the gorgeous garden wedding he's creating.

6.title: Hollywood Glam Bride
6.plot: Bride Benita is an actress that wants a Hollywood Glam wedding, but she's procrastinated on all the details.

7.title: April in Paris Bride
7.plot: Wedding cake is important to every bride. But it has a deeper meaning to Kristina, who has struggled with an eating disorder.

8.title: Motown Bride
8.plot: Bride Sashani dreamed of being a pop star. Now she wants a Motown wedding. David will have to create a triple platinum event.

9.title: Picnic Wedding Bride
9.plot: David Tutera plans a picnic wedding.

10.title: Hawaiian Luau Bride
10.plot: Bride Kristin went from a size 24 to a size 6 after having a stroke. Now, David turns their backyard luau wedding into a real tropical dream.

11.title: Shabby Chic Bride
11.plot: David Tutera plans a shabby chic affair.

12.title: Snow White Bride
12.plot: Bride Sno E. wants a Snow White wedding. David decides to bring Sno E.'s storybook fantasy to life.

13.title: Control Bride
13.plot: David gives a bride complete control.

14.title: Asian Fusion Bride
14.plot: High school sweethearts Lauren and Justin want to combine Chinese and Indian traditions at their wedding. But they need David, and fast!

15.title: Mad Men Bride
15.plot: Taylor and Jason love "Mad Men," but they have no idea how to give their wedding that sixties style. David truly takes this wedding back in time!

16.title: Masquerade Bride
16.plot: David transforms this bride's tacky Halloween theme into an elegant masquerade ball.

17.title: Under the Sea Bride
17.plot: Diamond wants to be under the sea at her wedding! David takes her outlandish ideas and creates a wedding fit for a mermaid princess.

18.title: Paint the Wedding Red Bride
18.plot: Bride Amber wants a wedding filled with peace, love, and the color red, so David decides to paint the whole wedding red!

1.title: Burlesque Bride
1.plot: Tutera is pushed by a burlesque bride.

2.title: Mermaid Bride
2.plot: David reluctantly plans a mermaid theme.

4.title: Traveling Teacher Bride
4.plot: An anxious groom creates wedding chaos.

5.title: Heaven and Earth Bride
5.plot: A bride wants a heaven-and-earth theme.

6.title: Ancient Rome Bride
6.plot: A bride wants her groom to wear a toga.

7.title: David, Divas and Disasters
7.plot: A pushy Momzilla tries to get her way.

8.title: Inspired by Kim K
8.plot: Three controlling sisters push David Tutera to his limit as he plans a Kardashian inspired wedding for couple Vanessa and Adam.

9.title: Momzilla
9.plot: The mother-of-the-bride goes head-to-head with couple Mia and Matt, as David plans their Casablanca-themed wedding.

10.title: Baroque, Pin-Ups and Hot Rods
10.plot: A groom develops a man-crush on David.

11.title: Best Brides
11.plot: David reveals his best and worst brides.

12.title: Bollywood BBQ
12.plot: A couple wants a Bollywood BBQ wedding.

13.title: Family Feud Bride
13.plot: A bride's mom fuels an ugly family feud.

14.title: Reality TV Star Bride
14.plot: A reality star tries to upstage David.

-1.title: David Tutera's Top Ten
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: This season of My Fair Wedding gives viewers an up close look into David Tutera's world unlike anything we've seen on the show before. We're peeling back the veil and letting fans see the madness that happens behind the magic. We'll meet David's talented team who help bring his visions to life while keeping him sane at the same time. Expect more drama than ever before as they race against the clock to create one-of-a-kind weddings for unfiltered, uncompromising and often contentious brides.
imdb.title: My Fair Wedding
plot: This season of _My Fair Wedding_ (qv) gives viewers an up close look into David Tutera's world unlike anything we've seen on the show before. We're peeling back the veil and letting fans see the madness that happens behind the magic. We'll meet David's talented team who help bring his visions to life while keeping him sane at the same time. Expect more drama than ever before as they race against the clock to create one-of-a-kind weddings for unfiltered, uncompromising and often contentious brides.
